sourcesContent:
template-driven works!

Form Properties

  • Valid :{{ productForm.valid }}
  • Invalid :{{ productForm.invalid }}
  • Errors :{{ productForm.errors | json }}
  • touched :{{ productForm.touched }}
  • untouched :{{ productForm.untouched }}
  • dirty :{{ productForm.dirty }}
  • pristine :{{ productForm.pristine }}
ürün isim alanı gereklidir.
ürün isim alanı en az 5 krakter en fazla 10 karakter olabilir.
